cleaned_text: A Sound Mind Behavioral Health - A Nursing Corp. Psychiatric Nurse Practitioner, MSN, APRN, PMHNP, BC A Sound Mind Behavioral Health - A Nursing Corp. Psychiatric Nurse Practitioner, MSN, APRN, PMHNP, BC (she, her) Verified by Psychology Today 1 Endorsed Santa Monica, CA 90404 At A Sound Mind Behavioral Health, you are at the heart of everything we do. We understand that each individual is unique, and we tailor our treatments to meet your specific needs, preferences, and goals. Your well-being and comfort are our top priorities. We believe in harnessing the benefits of both Western medicine and natural supplementation to optimize your mental health. Our approach combines evidence-based practices with the healing properties of natural remedies, ensuring a comprehensive and balanced treatment plan. We focus on treating the whole person, recognizing the interconnectedness of the mind, body, and spirit. Our team of compassionate professionals not only addresses your mental health symptoms but also considers lifestyle factors, nutrition, and other holistic approaches to promote long-term well-being. Call or [Email]()A Sound Mind Behavioral Health - A Nursing Corp. now for a free 15 minute consultation - [(661) 546-9103](tel:+1-661-546-9103) Practice at a Glance Stevenson Ranch, CA 91381 Available online only All services are provided from the comfort of your home or any private location (within the state of California) of your choosing.
